subject_id.description: Unique identifier for the subject. This should be a unique identifier for the subject within the dataset.

pool_id.description: Unique identifier for the pool associated with the subject. This should be a unique identifier for the pool within the dataset.

subject_experimental_group.description: Experimental group associated with the subject. This should provide information about the experimental conditions or treatment groups to which the subject belongs.

age.description: Age of the subject. This should be a numeric value representing the age of the subject at the time of data collection.

species.description: Species of the subject. This should be the scientific name of the species.

strain.description: Strain of the subject. This should provide information about the genetic background of the subject.

rrid_for_strain.description: RRID for strain. This should be a unique identifier for the strain in the Research Resource Identifier (RRID) database.

age_category.description: Age category of the subject. This should provide information about the age range of the subject.

also_in_dataset.description: Indicates if the subject is also part of another dataset.

member_of.description: Indicates the group or pool the subject is a member of.

metadata_only.description: Indicates if this entry is metadata only.

laboratory_internal_id.description: Internal identifier used by the laboratory for the subject.

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the subject.

age_range_min.description: Minimum age range of the subject.

age_range_max.description: Maximum age range of the subject.

reference_atlas.description: Reference atlas used for the subject.

experimental_log_file_path.description: Path to the experimental log file for the subject.

experiment_date.description: Date of the experiment involving the subject.

disease_or_disorder.description: Disease or disorder associated with the subject.

disease_model.description: Disease model associated with the subject.

protocol_title.description: Title of the protocol used for the subject.

protocol_url_or_doi.description: URL or DOI of the protocol used for the subject.

additionalProperties.description: Additional properties for the subject. This can include any other relevant information about the subject that is not covered by the predefined fields.
